text: @realDonaldTrump Hey genius, you keeps telling us YOU saved millions and millions of lives. you don't mention the fact that if you did absolutely nothing (and considering you didn't do anything) for two months we're in the situation where we are the worst coronavirus country in the world ..😡😡😡
